name: Clyde Smoot
text: It's good I like the buffet n salad bar

name: Lisa Gigi Shepherd
text:
They have a excellent Sunday buffet. Food is hot & they keep the pizza bar full at all times along with pasta.
Good selection of both pizza, pasta & deserts. ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Porterfield
text: Do not order extra toppings, I did this twice and barely had any toppings on the pizzas.  Will not go back here!

name: Tamar Stinson
text: They were fast friendly and the food was awesome

name: VERONICA DOYAL
text: Good food and service.

name: sarah owens
text: Food was fresh and excellent! Our waitress was very pleasant and provided quick service. No complaints at all!

name: Rick Blackwell
text: Awesome food!

name: Michael Patterson
text: Good food,  friendly manager

name: Andy Wilson
text: Had our sons birthday party there. Everything was right. Food was good staff was great.

name: Jessie Powell
text: The restaurant was empty and yet we waited for a good 20 minutes for our order to be taken . Our waitress sat and talked to her friends while our order was sitting on the counter getting cold. My husband had to go and ask one of the cooks ‚Ä¶More

name: Cindy Russell
text: This Pizza Hut is located in a very small town.  Like most Pizza Huts, the pizzas on the buffet are primarily thin crust and nothing to write home about.  But dine in and pick up order pizzas are always great. And their garlic knots are to die for!

name: Roxana Young
text: Service wasn't very good messed up order and only got a half a pan of pasta when I asked about it the manager said it was just made skimpy

name: ruth richard
text: The pizza was outstanding our last visit to Pizza Hut. We ordered the thin and crispy crust. It was cooked to perfection. Cheese bread sticks were delish as well as the garlic parmesan knots. Staff was very friendly. Definitely going back.

name: Sylvia Shepherd
text: Great Food, Great Staff, Very Clean Restaurant!

name: katie kat glenn
text: Put jalape√±os on my dessert pizza on the bottom so we didnt notice until too late. Also messed up the other two pizzas one had no sauce and the toppings on the other were completely wrong. This pizza hut was great a month ago but this month theyve screwed up my order or just made it otherwise disgusting and full of grease.

name: Lois Cunningham
text: It has recently been remodeled and it is so nice inside. The manager is a great guy. He makes sure his customers and comfortable and satisfied. The food is very good. You will enjoy the atmosphere. And the food. And the employees. You will definitely want to go back.

name: Cindy Mefford
text: The pizones are the bestttt

name: Ron Creager
text: Wings and pizza were amazing. My waitress was literally the best.

name: Delbert Dye
text: Always good food.

name: Janicelle
text: Great food, great prices! A good place to bring the family and chat. This restaurant is really nice, and their food tastes like a little piece of heaven rained down. Definitely recommend this place to anyone In need of a bite, it's amazing!

name: Tasha Bivings
text: My family loves pizza hut!! And when we want to pick up some pizza this is our go to place. They are always fast friendly service. Thank you so much

name: K. Major
text: Not bad. Dining area was a little messy.

text: Order to go! Only way to get it done fast and hot

text: poor service they messed up our order and when i got our pasta it was more sauce than anything

name: Ron Hughes
text: Last 2 visits, pizza was overcooked and tasted dry. Different employees. Will not go back

name: Jacqulyn the Virgo
text: Nice and friendly wait staff, food was hot and good!! Sweet tea flows abundantly !! 2 thumbs up guys great little home town pizza hut newly remodeled from my understanding!  Will definitely be a repeat customer! !

name: James Coffman
text: Healdton pizza Hut was very enjoyable.

name: B Sharp
text: It has a very small dining area and Sunday lunch is very crowded. They do work hard to keep up with the demand.

name: Pamela Matthews
text: Very nice new interior with lots of seating. Food is fresh and we always get great service... especially when Loyd is working.

name: Margaret Perkins
text: There was so little on the pizza, a person can go get pizza at a convenient store & get more for less price,it's bn a year since we've been to Pizza Hut,I was really looking forward to a good supper, it was like eating a piece of cardboard. I was very disappointed.

text: They was extremely busy but our pizza was great and they kept apologizing for my wait

text: Incredible food and service!!!!   Today there was one waitress and a packed house,    the waitress Brandy was amazing,   the best service i have received at any restaurant!!!!  The manager Joe has an incredible  staff!
